title: Apple Support College Program At Home Advisor - Bennett College
summary: At Apple, we believe that dedication, a fun environment, creativity and innovation fuel the ultimate customer experience. Our Advisors engage with customers, explaining solutions with patience and providing an incredible customer experience.
description: At Apple, we believe our diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and passions help us create the ideas that move all of us forward. As an Apple Support College Advisor, you will be the friendly voice of Apple, providing world-class customer service, troubleshooting, and technical support. This position comes with competitive pay, great benefits, eligibility to participate in our company stock plan, time off, an employee discount, and resources to support your growth and development.
key_qualifications: Enrolled through December of 2026 or later in at least one class at a university in the U.S. pursuing a bachelor’s degree or higher; A quiet home workspace with necessary equipment; Minimum typing speed of 40 WPM; Successful completion of assessments and training; 2.7 GPA.
preferred_qualifications: Business, Communications, Computer Science, Engineering or any tech related major; Passion for customer service; Ability to navigate difficult conversations and display resilience; Effective time management; Able to research technical information and eagerness to learn.
pay_benefits: Competitive pay, great benefits, eligibility to participate in company stock plan, time off, employee discount, and resources for growth and development.
